description: High severity SIEM alert: Microsoft Defender Antivirus has detected malware or potentially unwanted software (HackTool:PowerShell/Mimikatz.F) on the local computer.

High severity SIEM alert: Microsoft Defender Antivirus detected malware (HackTool:PowerShell/Mimikatz.F) on host NUW-BEST-16. The malware is categorized as a high risk and is located in the user's AppData folder.
